DROP TABLE IF EXISTS tmpskl;
 CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tmpskl AS
 SELECT roba.sifra as [sifra], roba_prodaja.kolicina as [kolicina], roba.naziv as [naziv],skladiste.skladiste as [skladiste],roba_prodaja.vpc,round((((roba_prodaja.vpc*CAST(REPLACE(roba_prodaja.porez,',','.') as NUMERIC)/100) zbroj roba_prodaja.vpc)),2) as [mpc], roba_prodaja.nc as [nbc],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM kalkulacija_stavke LEFT JOIN kalkulacija ON kalkulacija.broj=kalkulacija_stavke.broj AND kalkulacija.id_skladiste=kalkulacija_stavke.id_skladiste WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(kalkulacija.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(kalkulacija.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND kalkulacija_stavke.id_skladiste='17' ),0) as [kalkulacija] ,
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM racun_stavke LEFT JOIN racuni ON racuni.broj_racuna=racun_stavke.broj_racuna AND racuni.id_ducan=racun_stavke.id_ducan AND racuni.id_kasa=racun_stavke.id_kasa WHERE sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND CAST(racuni.datum_racuna AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(racuni.datum_racuna AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND racun_stavke.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [maloprodaja],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM izdatnica_stavke LEFT JOIN izdatnica ON izdatnica.broj=izdatnica_stavke.broj AND izdatnica.id_izdatnica=izdatnica_stavke.id_izdatnica WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(izdatnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(izdatnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND izdatnica.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [izdatnica],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM primka_stavke LEFT JOIN primka ON primka.id_primka=primka_stavke.id_primka WHERE primka_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(primka.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(primka.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND primka.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [primka],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM faktura_stavke LEFT JOIN fakture ON fakture.broj_fakture=faktura_stavke.broj_fakture AND fakture.id_ducan=faktura_stavke.id_ducan AND fakture.id_kasa=faktura_stavke.id_kasa WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND fakture.oduzmi_iz_skladista='1' AND CAST(fakture.date AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(fakture.date AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND faktura_stavke.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [fakture],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM meduskladisnica_stavke LEFT JOIN meduskladisnica ON meduskladisnica.broj=meduskladisnica_stavke.broj AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od=meduskladisnica_stavke.iz_skladista WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_do='17'),0) as [meduskladisnica_na],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM meduskladisnica_stavke LEFT JOIN meduskladisnica ON meduskladisnica.broj=meduskladisnica_stavke.broj AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od=meduskladisnica_stavke.iz_skladista WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od='17'),0) as [meduskladisnica_iz],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM otpremnica_stavke LEFT JOIN otpremnice ON otpremnice.broj_otpremnice=otpremnica_stavke.broj_otpremnice AND otpremnice.id_skladiste=otpremnica_stavke.id_skladiste WHERE otpremnice.oduzmi_iz_skladista = true and otpremnica_stavke.sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND CAST(otpremnice.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(otpremnice.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND otpremnica_stavke.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [otpremnice],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM otpis_robe_stavke LEFT JOIN otpis_robe ON otpis_robe.broj=otpis_robe_stavke.broj WHERE otpis_robe_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(otpis_robe.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(otpis_robe.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND otpis_robe.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [otpis_robe],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM povrat_robe_stavke LEFT JOIN povrat_robe ON povrat_robe.broj=povrat_robe_stavke.broj WHERE povrat_robe_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND povrat_robe.datum>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(povrat_robe.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND povrat_robe.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [povratnica],
 coalesce((SELECT CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC) FROM pocetno WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND cast(pocetno.datum as timestamp) >= '2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND cast(pocetno.datum as timestamp) <= '2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND id_skladiste='17'),0) as [pocetno_stanje],
 coalesce((SELECT
 (SELECT 
   SUM( 
CAST(REPLACE(radni_nalog_stavke.kolicina, ',', '.') AS numeric) * (CAST(REPLACE(radni_nalog_normativ.kolicina, ',', '.') AS numeric))) 
FROM radni_nalog_normativ 
LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga = radni_nalog_normativ.broj 
LEFT JOIN radni_nalog_stavke ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga = radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga 
WHERE radni_nalog.id_skladiste='17'
AND normativi.sifra_artikla=radni_nalog_stavke.sifra_robe
))
) AS Kolicina
 FROM radni_nalog_stavke
 LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga=radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga
 LEFT JOIN normativi ON normativi.sifra_artikla=radni_nalog_stavke.sifra_robe
 LEFT JOIN normativi_stavke ON normativi_stavke.broj_normativa=normativi.broj_normativa
 WHERE  normativi_stavke.sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59'
 GROUP BY normativi_stavke.sifra_robe),0) AS [radni_nalog_oduzmi],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM radni_nalog_stavke LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga=radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga WHERE radni_nalog_stavke.sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND radni_nalog_stavke.id_skladiste='17' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59'),0) AS [radni_nalog_dodaj],
 coalesce((SELECT 
 COALESCE(SUM
 (
     CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)*
     (SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM racun_stavke LEFT JOIN racuni ON racuni.broj_racuna=racun_stavke.broj_racuna AND racuni.id_ducan=racun_stavke.id_ducan AND racuni.id_kasa=racun_stavke.id_kasa 
       WHERE normativi.sifra_artikla=racun_stavke.sifra_robe
     )
 ),0) AS kolicina
 FROM normativi_stavke 
    LEFT JOIN normativi ON normativi.broj_normativa = normativi_stavke.broj_normativa  
     LEFT JOIN roba ON roba.sifra=normativi.sifra_artikla
    WHERE roba.oduzmi='NE' AND normativi_stavke.sifra_robe=roba_prodaja.sifra AND normativi_stavke.id_skladiste=roba_prodaja.id_skladiste
     GROUP BY sifra_robe,id_skladiste), 0) AS [normativ]
 FROM roba 
 LEFT JOIN roba_prodaja ON roba_prodaja.sifra=roba.sifra
 LEFT JOIN skladiste ON skladiste.id_skladiste=roba_prodaja.id_skladiste
 WHERE roba.oduzmi='DA' AND roba_prodaja.id_skladiste='17' AND roba_prodaja.sifra='0141040' LIMIT 3000; SELECT t.sifra as [Šifra], t.pocetno_stanje zbroj t.kalkulacija zbroj t.primka zbroj t.meduskladisnica_na zbroj t.radni_nalog_dodaj - t.maloprodaja - t.fakture - t.meduskladisnica_iz - t.otpremnice - t.otpis_robe - t.radni_nalog_oduzmi - t.Izdatnica - t.povratnica as [Kolicina skladište], t.naziv as [Naziv], t.skladiste as [Skladište], t.vpc, t.mpc, t.nbc, t.normativ as [Normativ], t.kalkulacija as Kalkulacija, t.maloprodaja as Maloprodaja, t.izdatnica as Izdatnica, t.primka as Primka, t.fakture as Fakture, t.meduskladisnica_na as [Meduskladisnica na skladista], t.meduskladisnica_iz as [Meduskladisnica sa skladista], t.otpremnice as Otpremnice, t.povratnica as Povratnica, t.radni_nalog_oduzmi as [Radni nalog oduzmi], t.radni_nalog_dodaj as [Radni nalog dodaj], t.pocetno_stanje as [Pocetno stanje], t.otpis_robe as [Otpis robe] FROM tmpskl t;

 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM meduskladisnica_stavke LEFT JOIN meduskladisnica ON meduskladisnica.broj=meduskladisnica_stavke.broj AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od=meduskladisnica_stavke.iz_skladista WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od='17'),0) as [meduskladisnica_iz],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM otpremnica_stavke LEFT JOIN otpremnice ON otpremnice.broj_otpremnice=otpremnica_stavke.broj_otpremnice AND otpremnice.id_skladiste=otpremnica_stavke.id_skladiste WHERE otpremnice.oduzmi_iz_skladista = true and otpremnica_stavke.sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND CAST(otpremnice.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(otpremnice.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND otpremnica_stavke.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [otpremnice],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM otpis_robe_stavke LEFT JOIN otpis_robe ON otpis_robe.broj=otpis_robe_stavke.broj WHERE otpis_robe_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(otpis_robe.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(otpis_robe.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND otpis_robe.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [otpis_robe],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM povrat_robe_stavke LEFT JOIN povrat_robe ON povrat_robe.broj=povrat_robe_stavke.broj WHERE povrat_robe_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND povrat_robe.datum>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(povrat_robe.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND povrat_robe.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [povratnica],
 coalesce((SELECT CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC) FROM pocetno WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND cast(pocetno.datum as timestamp) >= '2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND cast(pocetno.datum as timestamp) <= '2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND id_skladiste='17'),0) as [pocetno_stanje],
 coalesce((SELECT
 (SELECT 
   SUM( 
CAST(REPLACE(radni_nalog_stavke.kolicina, ',', '.') AS numeric) * (CAST(REPLACE(radni_nalog_normativ.kolicina, ',', '.') AS numeric))) 
FROM radni_nalog_normativ 
LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga = radni_nalog_normativ.broj 
LEFT JOIN radni_nalog_stavke ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga = radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga 
WHERE radni_nalog_normativ.id_skladiste='17'
AND normativi.sifra_artikla=radni_nalog_stavke.sifra_robe
))
) AS Kolicina
 FROM radni_nalog_stavke
 LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga=radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga
 LEFT JOIN normativi ON normativi.sifra_artikla=radni_nalog_stavke.sifra_robe
 LEFT JOIN normativi_stavke ON normativi_stavke.broj_normativa=normativi.broj_normativa
 WHERE  normativi_stavke.sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59'
 GROUP BY normativi_stavke.sifra_robe),0) AS [radni_nalog_oduzmi],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM radni_nalog_stavke LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga=radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga WHERE radni_nalog_stavke.sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND radni_nalog_stavke.id_skladiste='17' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59'),0) AS [radni_nalog_dodaj],
 coalesce((SELECT 
 COALESCE(SUM
 (
     CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)*
     (SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM racun_stavke LEFT JOIN racuni ON racuni.broj_racuna=racun_stavke.broj_racuna AND racuni.id_ducan=racun_stavke.id_ducan AND racuni.id_kasa=racun_stavke.id_kasa 
       WHERE normativi.sifra_artikla=racun_stavke.sifra_robe
     )
 ),0) AS kolicina
 FROM normativi_stavke 
    LEFT JOIN normativi ON normativi.broj_normativa = normativi_stavke.broj_normativa  
     LEFT JOIN roba ON roba.sifra=normativi.sifra_artikla
    WHERE roba.oduzmi='NE' AND normativi_stavke.sifra_robe=roba_prodaja.sifra AND normativi_stavke.id_skladiste=roba_prodaja.id_skladiste
     GROUP BY sifra_robe,id_skladiste), 0) AS [normativ]
 FROM roba 
 LEFT JOIN roba_prodaja ON roba_prodaja.sifra=roba.sifra
 LEFT JOIN skladiste ON skladiste.id_skladiste=roba_prodaja.id_skladiste
 WHERE roba.oduzmi='DA' AND roba_prodaja.id_skladiste='17' AND roba_prodaja.sifra='0141040' LIMIT 3000; SELECT t.sifra as [Šifra], t.pocetno_stanje zbroj t.kalkulacija zbroj t.primka zbroj t.meduskladisnica_na zbroj t.radni_nalog_dodaj - t.maloprodaja - t.fakture - t.meduskladisnica_iz - t.otpremnice - t.otpis_robe - t.radni_nalog_oduzmi - t.Izdatnica - t.povratnica as [Kolicina skladište], t.naziv as [Naziv], t.skladiste as [Skladište], t.vpc, t.mpc, t.nbc, t.normativ as [Normativ], t.kalkulacija as Kalkulacija, t.maloprodaja as Maloprodaja, t.izdatnica as Izdatnica, t.primka as Primka, t.fakture as Fakture, t.meduskladisnica_na as [Meduskladisnica na skladista], t.meduskladisnica_iz as [Meduskladisnica sa skladista], t.otpremnice as Otpremnice, t.povratnica as Povratnica, t.radni_nalog_oduzmi as [Radni nalog oduzmi], t.radni_nalog_dodaj as [Radni nalog dodaj], t.pocetno_stanje as [Pocetno stanje], t.otpis_robe as [Otpis robe] FROM tmpskl t;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS tmpskl;
 CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tmpskl AS
 SELECT roba.sifra as [sifra], roba_prodaja.kolicina as [kolicina], roba.naziv as [naziv],skladiste.skladiste as [skladiste],roba_prodaja.vpc,round((((roba_prodaja.vpc*CAST(REPLACE(roba_prodaja.porez,',','.') as NUMERIC)/100) zbroj roba_prodaja.vpc)),2) as [mpc], roba_prodaja.nc as [nbc],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM kalkulacija_stavke LEFT JOIN kalkulacija ON kalkulacija.broj=kalkulacija_stavke.broj AND kalkulacija.id_skladiste=kalkulacija_stavke.id_skladiste WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(kalkulacija.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(kalkulacija.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND kalkulacija_stavke.id_skladiste='17' ),0) as [kalkulacija] ,
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM racun_stavke LEFT JOIN racuni ON racuni.broj_racuna=racun_stavke.broj_racuna AND racuni.id_ducan=racun_stavke.id_ducan AND racuni.id_kasa=racun_stavke.id_kasa WHERE sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND CAST(racuni.datum_racuna AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(racuni.datum_racuna AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND racun_stavke.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [maloprodaja],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM izdatnica_stavke LEFT JOIN izdatnica ON izdatnica.broj=izdatnica_stavke.broj AND izdatnica.id_izdatnica=izdatnica_stavke.id_izdatnica WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(izdatnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(izdatnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND izdatnica.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [izdatnica],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM primka_stavke LEFT JOIN primka ON primka.id_primka=primka_stavke.id_primka WHERE primka_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(primka.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(primka.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND primka.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [primka],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM faktura_stavke LEFT JOIN fakture ON fakture.broj_fakture=faktura_stavke.broj_fakture AND fakture.id_ducan=faktura_stavke.id_ducan AND fakture.id_kasa=faktura_stavke.id_kasa WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND fakture.oduzmi_iz_skladista='1' AND CAST(fakture.date AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(fakture.date AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND faktura_stavke.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [fakture],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM meduskladisnica_stavke LEFT JOIN meduskladisnica ON meduskladisnica.broj=meduskladisnica_stavke.broj AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od=meduskladisnica_stavke.iz_skladista WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_do='17'),0) as [meduskladisnica_na],

 coalesce((SELECT CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC) FROM pocetno WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND cast(pocetno.datum as timestamp) >= '2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND cast(pocetno.datum as timestamp) <= '2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND id_skladiste='17'),0) as [pocetno_stanje],

 (SELECT 
   SUM( 
CAST(REPLACE(radni_nalog_stavke.kolicina, ',', '.') AS numeric) * (CAST(REPLACE(radni_nalog_normativ.kolicina, ',', '.') AS numeric))) 
FROM radni_nalog_normativ 
LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga = radni_nalog_normativ.broj 
LEFT JOIN radni_nalog_stavke ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga = radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga 
WHERE radni_nalog_normativ.id_skladiste='17'
))
) AS Kolicina
 FROM radni_nalog_stavke
 LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga=radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga
 LEFT JOIN normativi ON normativi.sifra_artikla=radni_nalog_stavke.sifra_robe
 LEFT JOIN normativi_stavke ON normativi_stavke.broj_normativa=normativi.broj_normativa

 GROUP BY normativi_stavke.sifra_robe),0) AS [radni_nalog_oduzmi],

     CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)*

       WHERE normativi.sifra_artikla=racun_stavke.sifra_robe
     )
 ),0) AS kolicina
 FROM normativi_stavke 
    LEFT JOIN normativi ON normativi.broj_normativa = normativi_stavke.broj_normativa  
     LEFT JOIN roba ON roba.sifra=normativi.sifra_artikla
    WHERE roba.oduzmi='NE' AND normativi_stavke.sifra_robe=roba_prodaja.sifra AND normativi_stavke.id_skladiste=roba_prodaja.id_skladiste
     GROUP BY sifra_robe,id_skladiste), 0) AS [normativ]

 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM izdatnica_stavke LEFT JOIN izdatnica ON izdatnica.broj=izdatnica_stavke.broj AND izdatnica.id_izdatnica=izdatnica_stavke.id_izdatnica WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(izdatnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(izdatnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND izdatnica.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [izdatnica],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM primka_stavke LEFT JOIN primka ON primka.id_primka=primka_stavke.id_primka WHERE primka_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(primka.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(primka.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND primka.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [primka],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM faktura_stavke LEFT JOIN fakture ON fakture.broj_fakture=faktura_stavke.broj_fakture AND fakture.id_ducan=faktura_stavke.id_ducan AND fakture.id_kasa=faktura_stavke.id_kasa WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND fakture.oduzmi_iz_skladista='1' AND CAST(fakture.date AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(fakture.date AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND faktura_stavke.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [fakture],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM meduskladisnica_stavke LEFT JOIN meduskladisnica ON meduskladisnica.broj=meduskladisnica_stavke.broj AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od=meduskladisnica_stavke.iz_skladista WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_do='17'),0) as [meduskladisnica_na],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM meduskladisnica_stavke LEFT JOIN meduskladisnica ON meduskladisnica.broj=meduskladisnica_stavke.broj AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od=meduskladisnica_stavke.iz_skladista WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od='17'),0) as [meduskladisnica_iz],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM otpremnica_stavke LEFT JOIN otpremnice ON otpremnice.broj_otpremnice=otpremnica_stavke.broj_otpremnice AND otpremnice.id_skladiste=otpremnica_stavke.id_skladiste WHERE otpremnice.oduzmi_iz_skladista = true and otpremnica_stavke.sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND CAST(otpremnice.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(otpremnice.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND otpremnica_stavke.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [otpremnice],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM otpis_robe_stavke LEFT JOIN otpis_robe ON otpis_robe.broj=otpis_robe_stavke.broj WHERE otpis_robe_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(otpis_robe.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(otpis_robe.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND otpis_robe.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [otpis_robe],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM povrat_robe_stavke LEFT JOIN povrat_robe ON povrat_robe.broj=povrat_robe_stavke.broj WHERE povrat_robe_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND povrat_robe.datum>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(povrat_robe.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND povrat_robe.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [povratnica],
 coalesce((SELECT CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC) FROM pocetno WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND cast(pocetno.datum as timestamp) >= '2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND cast(pocetno.datum as timestamp) <= '2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND id_skladiste='17'),0) as [pocetno_stanje],
 coalesce((SELECT
 (SELECT 
   SUM( 
CAST(REPLACE(radni_nalog_stavke.kolicina, ',', '.') AS numeric) * (CAST(REPLACE(radni_nalog_normativ.kolicina, ',', '.') AS numeric))) 
FROM radni_nalog_normativ 
LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga = radni_nalog_normativ.broj 
LEFT JOIN radni_nalog_stavke ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga = radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga 
WHERE radni_nalog_normativ.id_skladiste='17'
))
) AS Kolicina
 FROM radni_nalog_stavke
 LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga=radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga
 LEFT JOIN normativi ON normativi.sifra_artikla=radni_nalog_stavke.sifra_robe
 LEFT JOIN normativi_stavke ON normativi_stavke.broj_normativa=normativi.broj_normativa
 WHERE  normativi_stavke.sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59'
 GROUP BY normativi_stavke.sifra_robe AS [radni_nalog_oduzmi],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM radni_nalog_stavke LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga=radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga WHERE radni_nalog_stavke.sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND radni_nalog_stavke.id_skladiste='17' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59'),0) AS [radni_nalog_dodaj],
 coalesce((SELECT 
 COALESCE(SUM
 (
     CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)*
     (SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM racun_stavke LEFT JOIN racuni ON racuni.broj_racuna=racun_stavke.broj_racuna AND racuni.id_ducan=racun_stavke.id_ducan AND racuni.id_kasa=racun_stavke.id_kasa 
       WHERE normativi.sifra_artikla=racun_stavke.sifra_robe
     )
 ),0) AS kolicina
 FROM normativi_stavke 
    LEFT JOIN normativi ON normativi.broj_normativa = normativi_stavke.broj_normativa  
     LEFT JOIN roba ON roba.sifra=normativi.sifra_artikla
    WHERE roba.oduzmi='NE' AND normativi_stavke.sifra_robe=roba_prodaja.sifra AND normativi_stavke.id_skladiste=roba_prodaja.id_skladiste
     GROUP BY sifra_robe,id_skladiste), 0) AS [normativ]
 FROM roba 
 LEFT JOIN roba_prodaja ON roba_prodaja.sifra=roba.sifra
 LEFT JOIN skladiste ON skladiste.id_skladiste=roba_prodaja.id_skladiste
 WHERE roba.oduzmi='DA' AND roba_prodaja.id_skladiste='17' AND roba_prodaja.sifra='0141040' LIMIT 3000; SELECT t.sifra as [Šifra], t.pocetno_stanje zbroj t.kalkulacija zbroj t.primka zbroj t.meduskladisnica_na zbroj t.radni_nalog_dodaj - t.maloprodaja - t.fakture - t.meduskladisnica_iz - t.otpremnice - t.otpis_robe - t.radni_nalog_oduzmi - t.Izdatnica - t.povratnica as [Kolicina skladište], t.naziv as [Naziv], t.skladiste as [Skladište], t.vpc, t.mpc, t.nbc, t.normativ as [Normativ], t.kalkulacija as Kalkulacija, t.maloprodaja as Maloprodaja, t.izdatnica as Izdatnica, t.primka as Primka, t.fakture as Fakture, t.meduskladisnica_na as [Meduskladisnica na skladista], t.meduskladisnica_iz as [Meduskladisnica sa skladista], t.otpremnice as Otpremnice, t.povratnica as Povratnica, t.radni_nalog_oduzmi as [Radni nalog oduzmi], t.radni_nalog_dodaj as [Radni nalog dodaj], t.pocetno_stanje as [Pocetno stanje], t.otpis_robe as [Otpis robe] FROM tmpskl t;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS tmpskl;
 CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tmpskl AS
 SELECT roba.sifra as [sifra], roba_prodaja.kolicina as [kolicina], roba.naziv as [naziv],skladiste.skladiste as [skladiste],roba_prodaja.vpc,round((((roba_prodaja.vpc*CAST(REPLACE(roba_prodaja.porez,',','.') as NUMERIC)/100) zbroj roba_prodaja.vpc)),2) as [mpc], roba_prodaja.nc as [nbc],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM kalkulacija_stavke LEFT JOIN kalkulacija ON kalkulacija.broj=kalkulacija_stavke.broj AND kalkulacija.id_skladiste=kalkulacija_stavke.id_skladiste WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(kalkulacija.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(kalkulacija.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND kalkulacija_stavke.id_skladiste='17' ),0) as [kalkulacija] ,

 (SELECT 
   SUM( 
CAST(REPLACE(radni_nalog_stavke.kolicina, ',', '.') AS numeric) * (CAST(REPLACE(radni_nalog_normativ.kolicina, ',', '.') AS numeric))) 
FROM radni_nalog_normativ 
LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga = radni_nalog_normativ.broj 
LEFT JOIN radni_nalog_stavke ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga = radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga 
WHERE radni_nalog_normativ.id_skladiste='17'
))

 LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga=radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga

 LEFT JOIN normativi_stavke ON normativi_stavke.broj_normativa=normativi.broj_normativa

 GROUP BY radni_nalog_normativ.sifra),0) AS [radni_nalog_oduzmi],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM radni_nalog_stavke LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga=radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga WHERE radni_nalog_stavke.sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND radni_nalog_stavke.id_skladiste='17' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59'),0) AS [radni_nalog_dodaj],

 COALESCE(SUM
 (
     CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)*
     (SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM racun_stavke LEFT JOIN racuni ON racuni.broj_racuna=racun_stavke.broj_racuna AND racuni.id_ducan=racun_stavke.id_ducan AND racuni.id_kasa=racun_stavke.id_kasa 
       WHERE normativi.sifra_artikla=racun_stavke.sifra_robe
     )
 ),0) AS kolicina
 FROM normativi_stavke 
    LEFT JOIN normativi ON normativi.broj_normativa = normativi_stavke.broj_normativa  
     LEFT JOIN roba ON roba.sifra=normativi.sifra_artikla
    WHERE roba.oduzmi='NE' AND normativi_stavke.sifra_robe=roba_prodaja.sifra AND normativi_stavke.id_skladiste=roba_prodaja.id_skladiste
     GROUP BY sifra_robe,id_skladiste), 0) AS [normativ]
 FROM roba 
 LEFT JOIN roba_prodaja ON roba_prodaja.sifra=roba.sifra
 LEFT JOIN skladiste ON skladiste.id_skladiste=roba_prodaja.id_skladiste

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS tmpskl;
 CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tmpskl AS
 SELECT roba.sifra as [sifra], roba_prodaja.kolicina as [kolicina], roba.naziv as [naziv],skladiste.skladiste as [skladiste],roba_prodaja.vpc,round((((roba_prodaja.vpc*CAST(REPLACE(roba_prodaja.porez,',','.') as NUMERIC)/100) zbroj roba_prodaja.vpc)),2) as [mpc], roba_prodaja.nc as [nbc],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM kalkulacija_stavke LEFT JOIN kalkulacija ON kalkulacija.broj=kalkulacija_stavke.broj AND kalkulacija.id_skladiste=kalkulacija_stavke.id_skladiste WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(kalkulacija.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(kalkulacija.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND kalkulacija_stavke.id_skladiste='17' ),0) as [kalkulacija] ,
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM racun_stavke LEFT JOIN racuni ON racuni.broj_racuna=racun_stavke.broj_racuna AND racuni.id_ducan=racun_stavke.id_ducan AND racuni.id_kasa=racun_stavke.id_kasa WHERE sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND CAST(racuni.datum_racuna AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(racuni.datum_racuna AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND racun_stavke.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [maloprodaja],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM izdatnica_stavke LEFT JOIN izdatnica ON izdatnica.broj=izdatnica_stavke.broj AND izdatnica.id_izdatnica=izdatnica_stavke.id_izdatnica WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(izdatnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(izdatnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND izdatnica.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [izdatnica],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM primka_stavke LEFT JOIN primka ON primka.id_primka=primka_stavke.id_primka WHERE primka_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(primka.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(primka.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND primka.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [primka],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM faktura_stavke LEFT JOIN fakture ON fakture.broj_fakture=faktura_stavke.broj_fakture AND fakture.id_ducan=faktura_stavke.id_ducan AND fakture.id_kasa=faktura_stavke.id_kasa WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND fakture.oduzmi_iz_skladista='1' AND CAST(fakture.date AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(fakture.date AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND faktura_stavke.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [fakture],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM meduskladisnica_stavke LEFT JOIN meduskladisnica ON meduskladisnica.broj=meduskladisnica_stavke.broj AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od=meduskladisnica_stavke.iz_skladista WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_do='17'),0) as [meduskladisnica_na],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM meduskladisnica_stavke LEFT JOIN meduskladisnica ON meduskladisnica.broj=meduskladisnica_stavke.broj AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od=meduskladisnica_stavke.iz_skladista WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od='17'),0) as [meduskladisnica_iz],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM otpremnica_stavke LEFT JOIN otpremnice ON otpremnice.broj_otpremnice=otpremnica_stavke.broj_otpremnice AND otpremnice.id_skladiste=otpremnica_stavke.id_skladiste WHERE otpremnice.oduzmi_iz_skladista = true and otpremnica_stavke.sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND CAST(otpremnice.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(otpremnice.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND otpremnica_stavke.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [otpremnice],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM otpis_robe_stavke LEFT JOIN otpis_robe ON otpis_robe.broj=otpis_robe_stavke.broj WHERE otpis_robe_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(otpis_robe.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(otpis_robe.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND otpis_robe.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [otpis_robe],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM povrat_robe_stavke LEFT JOIN povrat_robe ON povrat_robe.broj=povrat_robe_stavke.broj WHERE povrat_robe_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND povrat_robe.datum>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(povrat_robe.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND povrat_robe.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [povratnica],
 coalesce((SELECT CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC) FROM pocetno WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND cast(pocetno.datum as timestamp) >= '2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND cast(pocetno.datum as timestamp) <= '2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND id_skladiste='17'),0) as [pocetno_stanje],
 coalesce((SELECT
 (SELECT 
   SUM( 
CAST(REPLACE(radni_nalog_stavke.kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)* 
(SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM radni_nalog_normativ 
LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga = radni_nalog_normativ.broj  
WHERE radni_nalog.id_skladiste='17'
))
) AS Kolicina
 FROM radni_nalog_stavke
 LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga=radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga
 LEFT JOIN radni_nalog_normativ ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga = radni_nalog_normativ.broj
 LEFT JOIN radni_nalog_stavke ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga = radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga
 WHERE CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59'
 GROUP BY radni_nalog_normativ.sifra),0) AS [radni_nalog_oduzmi],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM radni_nalog_stavke LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga=radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga WHERE radni_nalog_stavke.sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND radni_nalog_stavke.id_skladiste='17' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59'),0) AS [radni_nalog_dodaj],
 coalesce((SELECT 
 COALESCE(SUM
 (
     CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)*
     (SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM racun_stavke LEFT JOIN racuni ON racuni.broj_racuna=racun_stavke.broj_racuna AND racuni.id_ducan=racun_stavke.id_ducan AND racuni.id_kasa=racun_stavke.id_kasa 
       WHERE normativi.sifra_artikla=racun_stavke.sifra_robe
     )
 ),0) AS kolicina
 FROM normativi_stavke 
    LEFT JOIN normativi ON normativi.broj_normativa = normativi_stavke.broj_normativa  
     LEFT JOIN roba ON roba.sifra=normativi.sifra_artikla
    WHERE roba.oduzmi='NE' AND normativi_stavke.sifra_robe=roba_prodaja.sifra AND normativi_stavke.id_skladiste=roba_prodaja.id_skladiste
     GROUP BY sifra_robe,id_skladiste), 0) AS [normativ]
 FROM roba 
 LEFT JOIN roba_prodaja ON roba_prodaja.sifra=roba.sifra
 LEFT JOIN skladiste ON skladiste.id_skladiste=roba_prodaja.id_skladiste
 WHERE roba.oduzmi='DA' AND roba_prodaja.id_skladiste='17' AND roba_prodaja.sifra='0141040' LIMIT 3000; SELECT t.sifra as [Šifra], t.pocetno_stanje zbroj t.kalkulacija zbroj t.primka zbroj t.meduskladisnica_na zbroj t.radni_nalog_dodaj - t.maloprodaja - t.fakture - t.meduskladisnica_iz - t.otpremnice - t.otpis_robe - t.radni_nalog_oduzmi - t.Izdatnica - t.povratnica as [Kolicina skladište], t.naziv as [Naziv], t.skladiste as [Skladište], t.vpc, t.mpc, t.nbc, t.normativ as [Normativ], t.kalkulacija as Kalkulacija, t.maloprodaja as Maloprodaja, t.izdatnica as Izdatnica, t.primka as Primka, t.fakture as Fakture, t.meduskladisnica_na as [Meduskladisnica na skladista], t.meduskladisnica_iz as [Meduskladisnica sa skladista], t.otpremnice as Otpremnice, t.povratnica as Povratnica, t.radni_nalog_oduzmi as [Radni nalog oduzmi], t.radni_nalog_dodaj as [Radni nalog dodaj], t.pocetno_stanje as [Pocetno stanje], t.otpis_robe as [Otpis robe] FROM tmpskl t;

GREŠKA:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS tmpskl;
 CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tmpskl AS
 SELECT roba.sifra as [sifra], roba_prodaja.kolicina as [kolicina], roba.naziv as [naziv],skladiste.skladiste as [skladiste],roba_prodaja.vpc,round((((roba_prodaja.vpc*CAST(REPLACE(roba_prodaja.porez,',','.') as NUMERIC)/100) zbroj roba_prodaja.vpc)),2) as [mpc], roba_prodaja.nc as [nbc],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM kalkulacija_stavke LEFT JOIN kalkulacija ON kalkulacija.broj=kalkulacija_stavke.broj AND kalkulacija.id_skladiste=kalkulacija_stavke.id_skladiste WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(kalkulacija.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(kalkulacija.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND kalkulacija_stavke.id_skladiste='17' ),0) as [kalkulacija] ,
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM racun_stavke LEFT JOIN racuni ON racuni.broj_racuna=racun_stavke.broj_racuna AND racuni.id_ducan=racun_stavke.id_ducan AND racuni.id_kasa=racun_stavke.id_kasa WHERE sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND CAST(racuni.datum_racuna AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(racuni.datum_racuna AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND racun_stavke.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [maloprodaja],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM izdatnica_stavke LEFT JOIN izdatnica ON izdatnica.broj=izdatnica_stavke.broj AND izdatnica.id_izdatnica=izdatnica_stavke.id_izdatnica WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(izdatnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(izdatnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND izdatnica.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [izdatnica],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM primka_stavke LEFT JOIN primka ON primka.id_primka=primka_stavke.id_primka WHERE primka_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(primka.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(primka.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND primka.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [primka],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM faktura_stavke LEFT JOIN fakture ON fakture.broj_fakture=faktura_stavke.broj_fakture AND fakture.id_ducan=faktura_stavke.id_ducan AND fakture.id_kasa=faktura_stavke.id_kasa WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND fakture.oduzmi_iz_skladista='1' AND CAST(fakture.date AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(fakture.date AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND faktura_stavke.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [fakture],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM meduskladisnica_stavke LEFT JOIN meduskladisnica ON meduskladisnica.broj=meduskladisnica_stavke.broj AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od=meduskladisnica_stavke.iz_skladista WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_do='17'),0) as [meduskladisnica_na],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM meduskladisnica_stavke LEFT JOIN meduskladisnica ON meduskladisnica.broj=meduskladisnica_stavke.broj AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od=meduskladisnica_stavke.iz_skladista WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od='17'),0) as [meduskladisnica_iz],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM otpremnica_stavke LEFT JOIN otpremnice ON otpremnice.broj_otpremnice=otpremnica_stavke.broj_otpremnice AND otpremnice.id_skladiste=otpremnica_stavke.id_skladiste WHERE otpremnice.oduzmi_iz_skladista = true and otpremnica_stavke.sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND CAST(otpremnice.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(otpremnice.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND otpremnica_stavke.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [otpremnice],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM otpis_robe_stavke LEFT JOIN otpis_robe ON otpis_robe.broj=otpis_robe_stavke.broj WHERE otpis_robe_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(otpis_robe.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(otpis_robe.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND otpis_robe.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [otpis_robe],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM povrat_robe_stavke LEFT JOIN povrat_robe ON povrat_robe.broj=povrat_robe_stavke.broj WHERE povrat_robe_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND povrat_robe.datum>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(povrat_robe.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND povrat_robe.id_skladiste='17'),0) as [povratnica],
 coalesce((SELECT CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC) FROM pocetno WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND cast(pocetno.datum as timestamp) >= '2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND cast(pocetno.datum as timestamp) <= '2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND id_skladiste='17'),0) as [pocetno_stanje],
 coalesce((SELECT
 (SELECT 
   SUM( 
CAST(REPLACE(radni_nalog_stavke.kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)* 
(SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM radni_nalog_normativ 
LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga = radni_nalog_normativ.broj  
WHERE radni_nalog_normativ.id_skladiste='17'
))
) AS Kolicina
 FROM radni_nalog_normativ
 LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga=radni_nalog_normativ.broj
 LEFT JOIN radni_nalog_stavke ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga = radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga
 WHERE CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59'
 GROUP BY radni_nalog_normativ.sifra),0) AS [radni_nalog_oduzmi],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM radni_nalog_stavke LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga=radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga WHERE radni_nalog_stavke.sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND radni_nalog_stavke.id_skladiste='17' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59'),0) AS [radni_nalog_dodaj],
 coalesce((SELECT 
 COALESCE(SUM
 (
     CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)*
     (SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM racun_stavke LEFT JOIN racuni ON racuni.broj_racuna=racun_stavke.broj_racuna AND racuni.id_ducan=racun_stavke.id_ducan AND racuni.id_kasa=racun_stavke.id_kasa 
       WHERE normativi.sifra_artikla=racun_stavke.sifra_robe
     )
 ),0) AS kolicina
 FROM normativi_stavke 
    LEFT JOIN normativi ON normativi.broj_normativa = normativi_stavke.broj_normativa  
     LEFT JOIN roba ON roba.sifra=normativi.sifra_artikla
    WHERE roba.oduzmi='NE' AND normativi_stavke.sifra_robe=roba_prodaja.sifra AND normativi_stavke.id_skladiste=roba_prodaja.id_skladiste
     GROUP BY sifra_robe,id_skladiste), 0) AS [normativ]
 FROM roba 
 LEFT JOIN roba_prodaja ON roba_prodaja.sifra=roba.sifra
 LEFT JOIN skladiste ON skladiste.id_skladiste=roba_prodaja.id_skladiste
 WHERE roba.oduzmi='DA' AND roba_prodaja.id_skladiste='17' AND roba_prodaja.sifra='0141040' LIMIT 3000; SELECT t.sifra as [Šifra], t.pocetno_stanje zbroj t.kalkulacija zbroj t.primka zbroj t.meduskladisnica_na zbroj t.radni_nalog_dodaj - t.maloprodaja - t.fakture - t.meduskladisnica_iz - t.otpremnice - t.otpis_robe - t.radni_nalog_oduzmi - t.Izdatnica - t.povratnica as [Kolicina skladište], t.naziv as [Naziv], t.skladiste as [Skladište], t.vpc, t.mpc, t.nbc, t.normativ as [Normativ], t.kalkulacija as Kalkulacija, t.maloprodaja as Maloprodaja, t.izdatnica as Izdatnica, t.primka as Primka, t.fakture as Fakture, t.meduskladisnica_na as [Meduskladisnica na skladista], t.meduskladisnica_iz as [Meduskladisnica sa skladista], t.otpremnice as Otpremnice, t.povratnica as Povratnica, t.radni_nalog_oduzmi as [Radni nalog oduzmi], t.radni_nalog_dodaj as [Radni nalog dodaj], t.pocetno_stanje as [Pocetno stanje], t.otpis_robe as [Otpis robe] FROM tmpskl t;

 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM radni_nalog_stavke LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga=radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga WHERE radni_nalog_stavke.sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND radni_nalog_stavke.id_skladiste='17' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59'),0) AS [radni_nalog_dodaj],

 COALESCE(SUM
 (
     CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)*
     (SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM racun_stavke LEFT JOIN racuni ON racuni.broj_racuna=racun_stavke.broj_racuna AND racuni.id_ducan=racun_stavke.id_ducan AND racuni.id_kasa=racun_stavke.id_kasa 
       WHERE normativi.sifra_artikla=racun_stavke.sifra_robe
     )
 ),0) AS kolicina
 FROM normativi_stavke 
    LEFT JOIN normativi ON normativi.broj_normativa = normativi_stavke.broj_normativa  
     LEFT JOIN roba ON roba.sifra=normativi.sifra_artikla
    WHERE roba.oduzmi='NE' AND normativi_stavke.sifra_robe=roba_prodaja.sifra AND normativi_stavke.id_skladiste=roba_prodaja.id_skladiste
     GROUP BY sifra_robe,id_skladiste), 0) AS [normativ]
 FROM roba 
 LEFT JOIN roba_prodaja ON roba_prodaja.sifra=roba.sifra
 LEFT JOIN skladiste ON skladiste.id_skladiste=roba_prodaja.id_skladiste

DATUM:26.4.2019. 14:16:43, FORMA: RemoteDB
LINIJA KODA:65
GREŠKA:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS tmpskl;
 CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tmpskl AS
 SELECT roba.sifra as [sifra], roba_prodaja.kolicina as [kolicina], roba.naziv as [naziv],skladiste.skladiste as [skladiste],roba_prodaja.vpc,round((((roba_prodaja.vpc*CAST(REPLACE(roba_prodaja.porez,',','.') as NUMERIC)/100) zbroj roba_prodaja.vpc)),2) as [mpc], roba_prodaja.nc as [nbc],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM kalkulacija_stavke LEFT JOIN kalkulacija ON kalkulacija.broj=kalkulacija_stavke.broj AND kalkulacija.id_skladiste=kalkulacija_stavke.id_skladiste WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(kalkulacija.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(kalkulacija.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND kalkulacija_stavke.id_skladiste='5' ),0) as [kalkulacija] ,
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM racun_stavke LEFT JOIN racuni ON racuni.broj_racuna=racun_stavke.broj_racuna AND racuni.id_ducan=racun_stavke.id_ducan AND racuni.id_kasa=racun_stavke.id_kasa WHERE sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND CAST(racuni.datum_racuna AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(racuni.datum_racuna AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND racun_stavke.id_skladiste='5'),0) as [maloprodaja],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM izdatnica_stavke LEFT JOIN izdatnica ON izdatnica.broj=izdatnica_stavke.broj AND izdatnica.id_izdatnica=izdatnica_stavke.id_izdatnica WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(izdatnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(izdatnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND izdatnica.id_skladiste='5'),0) as [izdatnica],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM primka_stavke LEFT JOIN primka ON primka.id_primka=primka_stavke.id_primka WHERE primka_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(primka.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(primka.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND primka.id_skladiste='5'),0) as [primka],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM faktura_stavke LEFT JOIN fakture ON fakture.broj_fakture=faktura_stavke.broj_fakture AND fakture.id_ducan=faktura_stavke.id_ducan AND fakture.id_kasa=faktura_stavke.id_kasa WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND fakture.oduzmi_iz_skladista='1' AND CAST(fakture.date AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(fakture.date AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND faktura_stavke.id_skladiste='5'),0) as [fakture],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM meduskladisnica_stavke LEFT JOIN meduskladisnica ON meduskladisnica.broj=meduskladisnica_stavke.broj AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od=meduskladisnica_stavke.iz_skladista WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_do='5'),0) as [meduskladisnica_na],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM meduskladisnica_stavke LEFT JOIN meduskladisnica ON meduskladisnica.broj=meduskladisnica_stavke.broj AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od=meduskladisnica_stavke.iz_skladista WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(meduskladisnica.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND meduskladisnica.id_skladiste_od='5'),0) as [meduskladisnica_iz],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM otpremnica_stavke LEFT JOIN otpremnice ON otpremnice.broj_otpremnice=otpremnica_stavke.broj_otpremnice AND otpremnice.id_skladiste=otpremnica_stavke.id_skladiste WHERE otpremnice.oduzmi_iz_skladista = true and otpremnica_stavke.sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND CAST(otpremnice.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(otpremnice.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND otpremnica_stavke.id_skladiste='5'),0) as [otpremnice],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM otpis_robe_stavke LEFT JOIN otpis_robe ON otpis_robe.broj=otpis_robe_stavke.broj WHERE otpis_robe_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND CAST(otpis_robe.datum AS timestamp)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(otpis_robe.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND otpis_robe.id_skladiste='5'),0) as [otpis_robe],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM povrat_robe_stavke LEFT JOIN povrat_robe ON povrat_robe.broj=povrat_robe_stavke.broj WHERE povrat_robe_stavke.sifra=roba.sifra AND povrat_robe.datum>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(povrat_robe.datum AS timestamp)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND povrat_robe.id_skladiste='5'),0) as [povratnica],
 coalesce((SELECT CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC) FROM pocetno WHERE sifra=roba.sifra AND cast(pocetno.datum as timestamp) >= '2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND cast(pocetno.datum as timestamp) <= '2019-12-31 23:59:59' AND id_skladiste='5'),0) as [pocetno_stanje],
 coalesce((SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(radni_nalog_normativ.kolicina, ',', '.') as NUMERIC)) FROM radni_nalog_normativ WHERE sifra = '0141040'), 0) AS [radni_nalog_oduzmi],
 coalesce((SELECT
 (SELECT 
   SUM( 
CAST(REPLACE(radni_nalog_stavke.kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)* 
(SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM normativi_stavke 
LEFT JOIN normativi ON normativi.broj_normativa = normativi_stavke.broj_normativa  
WHERE normativi_stavke.sifra_robe = roba_prodaja.sifra AND normativi_stavke.id_skladiste='5'
AND normativi.sifra_artikla=radni_nalog_stavke.sifra_robe
))
) AS Kolicina
 FROM radni_nalog_stavke
 LEFT JOIN radni_nalog ON radni_nalog.broj_naloga=radni_nalog_stavke.broj_naloga
 LEFT JOIN normativi ON normativi.sifra_artikla=radni_nalog_stavke.sifra_robe
 LEFT JOIN normativi_stavke ON normativi_stavke.broj_normativa=normativi.broj_normativa
 WHERE  normativi_stavke.sifra_robe=roba.sifra AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)>='2019-01-01 00:00:00' AND CAST(radni_nalog.datum_naloga AS date)<='2019-12-31 23:59:59'
 GROUP BY normativi_stavke.sifra_robe),0) AS [radni_nalog_oduzmi],
 coalesce((SELECT 
 COALESCE(SUM
 (
     CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)*
     (SELECT SUM(CAST(REPLACE(kolicina,',','.') as NUMERIC)) FROM racun_stavke LEFT JOIN racuni ON racuni.broj_racuna=racun_stavke.broj_racuna AND racuni.id_ducan=racun_stavke.id_ducan AND racuni.id_kasa=racun_stavke.id_kasa 
       WHERE normativi.sifra_artikla=racun_stavke.sifra_robe
     )
 ),0) AS kolicina
 FROM normativi_stavke 
    LEFT JOIN normativi ON normativi.broj_normativa = normativi_stavke.broj_normativa  
     LEFT JOIN roba ON roba.sifra=normativi.sifra_artikla
    WHERE roba.oduzmi='NE' AND normativi_stavke.sifra_robe=roba_prodaja.sifra AND normativi_stavke.id_skladiste=roba_prodaja.id_skladiste
     GROUP BY sifra_robe,id_skladiste), 0) AS [normativ]
 FROM roba 
 LEFT JOIN roba_prodaja ON roba_prodaja.sifra=roba.sifra
 LEFT JOIN skladiste ON skladiste.id_skladiste=roba_prodaja.id_skladiste
 WHERE roba.oduzmi='DA' AND roba_prodaja.id_skladiste='5' AND roba_prodaja.sifra='0141040' LIMIT 3000; SELECT t.sifra as [Šifra], t.pocetno_stanje zbroj t.kalkulacija zbroj t.primka zbroj t.meduskladisnica_na zbroj t.radni_nalog_dodaj - t.maloprodaja - t.fakture - t.meduskladisnica_iz - t.otpremnice - t.otpis_robe - t.radni_nalog_oduzmi - t.Izdatnica - t.povratnica as [Kolicina skladište], t.naziv as [Naziv], t.skladiste as [Skladište], t.vpc, t.mpc, t.nbc, t.normativ as [Normativ], t.kalkulacija as Kalkulacija, t.maloprodaja as Maloprodaja, t.izdatnica as Izdatnica, t.primka as Primka, t.fakture as Fakture, t.meduskladisnica_na as [Meduskladisnica na skladista], t.meduskladisnica_iz as [Meduskladisnica sa skladista], t.otpremnice as Otpremnice, t.povratnica as Povratnica, t.radni_nalog_oduzmi as [Radni nalog oduzmi], t.radni_nalog_dodaj as [Radni nalog dodaj], t.pocetno_stanje as [Pocetno stanje], t.otpis_robe as [Otpis robe] FROM tmpskl t;
